name: Raspberries With Fromage Blanc
keywords: appetizer, fromage blanc, raspberries, sugar, raw, vegetarian, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 1/3 cups fromage blanc or soft, mild goat cheese

recipeInstructions.text: Force half the raspberries through a sieve and sweeten with the sugar, using more or less depending on the sweetness of the berries. Gently fold in the whole raspberries.
Put a scoop or neat mound of the cheese on each of four plates and spoon the raspberry mixture around it.
